passive.description:
When dealing weapon skill damage, applies [Target Mark] for 8s. After dealing Basic Attack Damage 3 times to a marked target, deals 
[Damage Rate: 90%] additional Physical Damage, inflicts 25% Slow for 2s, and increases
Movement Speed by 25% for 2s, also grants the next 2
Basic Attacks +60% Attack Speed for 6s. Basic Attack
Damage Bonuses affect damage and basic attack critical
hits can cause the damage to crit.
Removes [Target Mark] after triggering.

basicAttacks.description:
Replaces Basic Attack with [Split Arrow].
Deals 
[Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to up to 5
enemies in a frontal cone

Replaces Basic Attack with [Piercing Arrow].
Fires an arrow forward, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 170%]
Physical Damage and reducing Armor by 10% for 4s to all
enemies hit.
Range increases with charge time

[Basic Attack]:Deals 
[Damage Rate: 80%] Physical
Damage to the target. 
Every 6th Basic Attack becomes [Venom Arrow].
Deals 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage and inflicts
Venom. 
[Venom]
Deals 
[Damage Rate: 15%] Magic Damage every second
for 6s. Stacks up to 3 times ..

commonSkills.description:
Gains 10 explosive arrows for 12s.
When Basic Attacks or skill arrows hit enemies, deal 
[Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage to up to 5 nearby
enemies

Gains 10 frost arrows for 12s.
Basic Attacks and skill arrows deal 
[Damage Rate: 50%]
additional Physical Damage and inflict 40% Slow for 2s
on hit.

Fires a sleep arrow forward while self-knockback 14m. Deals 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage on first enemy hit and applies Sleep for 5 seconds.

Fires a silencing arrow forward. The first enemy hit takes 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage. After 2s, the
arrow inflicts 
[Damage Rate: 180%] additional Magic
Damage and applies Silence for 3s to enemies within 5m.

Fires three binding arrows forward. The first player hit by
each takes 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage
(
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to mobs) and is
Immobilized for 1.5s.
Gains 1 charge every 14s, up to 2 charges.

skills.description:
Rains arrows down at the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to players
(
[Damage Rate: 270%] Physical Damage to mobs) and
inflicting 30% Slow for 3s.
Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges

Gains 18 Splintershot and +30% Attack Speed for 20s.
Basic Attacks fire 2 additional arrows (in addition to the
Basic Attack), each dealing 
[Damage Rate: 30%] Magic
Damage.

Fires a Powershot in the target direction that explodes
upon hitting the first enemy, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%]
Magic Damage and Stunning up to 5 enemies in the area.
Damage increases with distance, up to 2x base damage.
Stun duration also scales with distance, starting at a
minimum of 1 seconds and reaching a maximum of 3
seconds when the arrow travels 80% of its maximum
range.

Shoots an Arcbolt in the target direction that deals 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage on hit and creates
a lightning disruption field.
The field lasts 8s, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 60%] Physical
Damage to enemies within 6m every 1s and reducing their
Armor by 10% for 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

Fires three Tempest Arrows forward, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage, reducing Attack Speed by
35% for 4s, and knocking targets back 5m. Enemies
knocked into terrain are Stunned for 2.5s.
When multiple arrows hit the same target, the damage
from arrows beyond the first is reduced by 30%.

Shoots 3 Severance Shots in the target direction, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemies hit
along the path, reducing their healing received by 20% for
4s.
When multiple Severance Shots hit the same target, the
damage of arrows beyond the first is reduced by 30%.
Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges

Fires a Shadow Vortex in the target direction. The first
enemy hit takes 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage.
After 0.5s, the vortex inflicts 
[Damage Rate: 220%] Magic
Damage to enemies within 7m, pulls them to the center,
and Slows them by 40% for 3s.
Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges
